nodes.text: Durese, also called Durosian, was the native language of the Duros.

Since the Duros were such prominent spacers and traders, Durese became a common interstellar tongue. It was an influence for Basic, and most Duros were fluent in both languages. Most likely, it was also the root language of Pak Pak. The Durese Writing system was a syllabary.
Feminine words used as given names
The following words had a meaning in Durese, but could be used as given names for female Duros.
Masculine words used as given names
The following words had a meaning in Durese, but could be used as given names for male Duros.
The following words had a meaning in Durese, but were also used as surnames.
